price: 32. Mpe soki bamoni bandimi balobi ete: Ya sólo, baye wana nde babunga nzela.
arabic: وَإِذَا رَأَوۡهُمۡ قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ لَضَآلُّونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā ra-awhum qālū inna hāulāi laḍāllūna
